author: Special Correspondent
text:
A special service centre for enrolling transgender has been opened in Tiruverambur taluk, said K.S. Palanisamy, District Collector. Inaugurating the special camp for enrolling transgender at the Collector’s office here on Saturday,Mr. Palanisamy said on Saturday that a total of 120 transgender had been enrolled in the voters’ list for the Assembly constituencies in the district.

With a view to ensuring cent per cent coverage in enrolment, the district administration has taken up this special camp. Transgender can enrol their names at this camp, he added.

This apart, the district administration has set up a special service centre in Tiruverambur for enrolling the transgender, as the Tiruverambur Assembly constituency accounted for the largest number of transgender in the district.

The Collector explained the special drive for enrolling voters where the strength of voters was far less in terms of sex ratio. Special awareness campaigns were being organised for ensuring cent per cent polling, he added.
title: Officials hold enrolment camp for transgender
